prod.full_name:
Jordan 1 Low
Fragment x Travis Scott
prod.path: Home/Sneakers/Air Jordan/Travis Scott/Jordan 1 Low Fragment X Travis Scott
prod.desciption:
The Air Jordan 1 Low Fragment Design x Travis Scott nods to the original 2016 Air Jordan 1 Fragment with its simple color blocking. It features a smooth white leather upper with black and royal blue leather overlays. From there, a signature reversed Swoosh and yellowed soles add a Cactus Jack flair to the classic silhouette.

The Air Jordan 1 Low Fragment Design x Travis Scott released in August of 2021 and retailed for $150.
